Addon.name: Dynamic Menu
Addon.CopyText: <AC type="DynamicMenu" Name="Dynamic Menu" QueryString="Menu=$menu name$&MenuNew=$Create New Menu$">
Addon.ArgumentList: Menu Name=Default[list(Dynamic Menus)] Create New Menu

Addon.name: Menu-Legacy3
Addon.ArgumentList: Create New Menu= Use Existing Menu=[listid(dynamic menus)]

Addon.name: Menu-Legacy2
Addon.ArgumentList: Create New Menu= Use Existing Menu=[listid(dynamic menus)]

Field.Name: MenuImageDownFilename
Field.Caption: Menu Image Current
Field.HelpDefault: If your menus use graphic images, this image will be used when this section is the current section. If blank, the Menu Image will be used.

Field.Name: menuImageDownOverFilename
Field.Caption: Menu Image Current Down
Field.HelpDefault: If your menus use graphic images, this image will be used when this section is the current section and the mouse is over this menu entry. If blank, the Menu Image Rollover will be used.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The name for this record. The name is generally used to identify the record in a list, and is often used as a caption when the record is displayed publicly

Field.Name: Active
Field.Caption: Active
Field.HelpDefault: Uncheck to temporarily disable this menu.

Field.Name: Depth
Field.Caption: Menu Depth
Field.HelpDefault: Choose no flyout for a simple list. Choose Tier Page Flyout for a menu that includes a flyout for tier pages.

Field.Name: classTopWrapper
Field.Caption: Top Wrapper Class
Field.HelpDefault: The class in the top level ul

Field.Name: classTopList
Field.Caption: Top List Class
Field.HelpDefault: The class in the top level ul

Field.Name: classTopItem
Field.Caption: Top Item Class
Field.HelpDefault: The class in each li element of the top level ul

Field.Name: classItemActive
Field.Caption: Active Item Class
Field.HelpDefault: The class added to an item when it is the current page or section.

Field.Name: classTierList
Field.Caption: Tier List Class
Field.HelpDefault: The class in each tier level ul

Field.Name: classTierItem
Field.Caption: Tier Item Class
Field.HelpDefault: The class in each li element of a tier level ul

Field.Name: classItemFirst
Field.Caption: First Item Class
Field.HelpDefault: The class added to the first li of all lists

Field.Name: classItemLast
Field.Caption: Last Item Class
Field.HelpDefault: The class added to the last li of all lists

Field.Name: classFlyoutParent
Field.Caption: Flyout Parent Class
Field.HelpDefault: Added to any menu entry that has a child flyout menu. It could be used to add marked designating there is a child menu.

Field.Name: classItemHover
Field.Caption: Hover Item Class
Field.HelpDefault: Added to an item when the mouse is hovering over it or any of its parent items.

Field.Name: addRootToTier
Field.Caption: Add Root Page to Tier Flyout
Field.HelpDefault: For Tier Page Flyouts, when the flyout is activated by a click, check this box and the root page is added to the flyout menu

Field.Name: RSSFeeds
Field.Caption: RSS Feeds
Field.HelpDefault: Select the feed(s) which will include this page.

Field.Name: RSSTitle
Field.Caption: Title
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) The title of the RSS Feed item. If omitted the page name will be used.

Field.Name: RSSLink
Field.Caption: RSSLink Override
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) If provided, when someone clicks on this RSS Feed item they will be taken to this link.

Field.Name: RSSDateExpire
Field.Caption: Date Expires
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) The date when this RSS Feed item expires.

Field.Name: RSSDatePublish
Field.Caption: Date Publish
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) The date of the RSS Feed Option. If omitted, the date this page was created will be used.

Field.Name: RSSDescription
Field.Caption: Description
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) The description of the RSS Feed item.
